Posts.EditableText:
Fixed Uploading Errors 

This is a game by my friend David and I, it takes place in an underground mine, where you may explore and must find all 10 artifacts. It is only beginning, but will have endless amounts of gameplay. Version 1 is going to be released very soon, and I hope you enjoy it. If you find a bug please tell me. 

The game has an interesting plot that will explained throughout the game. So far, version 1 doesn't explain a lot (its only the first puzzle challenge and the first artifact you find), but there will be much more to come. Please download and rate when it is released, and tell me what you think about this game on the forum right here! 

Thanks,
Tai

***Remember that you will not have your saved progress in the next version.

Also, I have been meaning to ask... Should I, when its time to upload version 2, delete the original version, or keep it?
